ModMetaData.name: Ponies of the Rim
ModMetaData.author: Ponλ
ModMetaData.description:
Simple mod that adds three pony races from the popular TV-show - My Little Pony™.
Mod overview: > 3 new races: Earthponies, Pegasi and Unicorns. > Over 500 pony names to choose from. > New hair styles with tails and manes. > 130+ simplistic cutiemarks > New Hay Meals to satisfy vegetarian needs of ponies. > Ponies can wear human clothes with a custom look for their bodies. > High compatability with other mods.
Ponies of the Rim: Core v0.3
